0.Instruction: Place the tongs in your right hand with your left hand.

1.Instruction: Position the thumb on one side of the tongs and the other four fingers on the other side.

2.Instruction: Pick up one ball at a time with the tongs.

3.Instruction: Transfer the ball to the towel.

4.Instruction: Repeat the third and fourth steps for all three balls.

5.Instruction: After all balls are transferred to the towel, pick up one ball at a time from the towel

6.Instruction: Transfer the ball back to the bowl.

7.Instruction: Repeat the last two steps until all balls are back in the bowl.
